events.title: North Korea Launches MRBM into Sea of Japan
events.summary: DPRK conducted a test of what appears to be a medium-range ballistic missile from the Sunan area. The missile traveled approximately 800 km before landing in the Sea of Japan outside Japan's exclusive economic zone.

events.title: DPRK Tests New Solid-Fuel ICBM
events.summary: North Korea successfully tested a new solid-fuel intercontinental ballistic missile, marking a significant advancement in their nuclear delivery capabilities. State media claimed the test demonstrated 'rapid nuclear counterattack capability.'

events.title: North Korea Fires Multiple Short-Range Missiles
events.summary: DPRK launched four short-range ballistic missiles from the Wonsan area toward the East Sea during military exercises. South Korean military is closely monitoring the situation.

events.title: Iranian Military Statement on Missile Readiness
events.summary: Iranian military officials announced enhanced missile readiness in response to regional tensions. The IRGC Aerospace Force commander stated that Iran's ballistic missile capabilities are at their 'highest level of preparedness.'

events.title: Iran Conducts Space Launch from Semnan
events.summary: Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps launched a satellite carrier rocket from the Imam Khomeini Space Center. The launch is believed to be testing technologies applicable to long-range ballistic missiles.

events.title: Iran Tests Hypersonic Missile 'Fattah-2'
events.summary: Iran announced the successful test of its Fattah-2 hypersonic ballistic missile, claiming it can evade all existing missile defense systems. Western analysts are evaluating the claims.

events.title: Russian Strategic Exercise Grom-2026
events.summary: Russia conducted scheduled strategic forces exercise 'Grom-2026' with multiple ICBM and SLBM test launches. The exercise involved all three legs of Russia's nuclear triad.

events.title: Russia Deploys Iskander Missiles to Belarus
events.summary: Satellite imagery confirms additional Iskander-M tactical missile systems have been deployed to Belarus near the Polish border, raising concerns among NATO allies.

events.title: China Tests DF-27 Hypersonic Glide Vehicle
events.summary: China's People's Liberation Army Rocket Force conducted a test of the DF-27 hypersonic glide vehicle over the South China Sea. The test demonstrates advancing Chinese hypersonic capabilities.

events.title: PLA Rocket Force Conducts Live-Fire Exercise
events.summary: China's PLA Rocket Force conducted large-scale live-fire exercises in western China, launching multiple DF-21D anti-ship ballistic missiles. The exercise comes amid heightened tensions in the Taiwan Strait.

events.title: India Successfully Tests Agni-V ICBM
events.summary: India's Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) successfully conducted a test of the Agni-V intercontinental ballistic missile from Abdul Kalam Island. The test validates India's nuclear deterrent capability.

events.title: Pakistan Tests Shaheen-III MRBM
events.summary: Pakistan's Strategic Plans Division conducted a successful test of the Shaheen-III medium-range ballistic missile. The test was part of a scheduled training exercise for the strategic forces.

events.title: Houthi Forces Launch Missiles at Red Sea Shipping
events.summary: Yemen's Houthi forces claimed responsibility for launching anti-ship ballistic missiles at commercial vessels in the Red Sea. The attack disrupted international shipping routes and prompted military responses.

events.title: Houthi Statement Threatens Expanded Attacks
events.summary: Houthi military spokesperson announced plans to expand missile attacks against vessels bound for Israeli ports. The statement warned all shipping companies to avoid Israeli-linked vessels.

events.title: Israel Conducts Arrow-3 Intercept Test
events.summary: Israel successfully tested its Arrow-3 exoatmospheric missile defense system, intercepting a target simulating a long-range ballistic missile threat. The test was conducted in cooperation with the United States.
